official_title: HPV Self-Sampling for Cervical Cancer Screening Among Lesbian, Bisexual, and Queer (LBQ) Women: A Pilot Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Self-identify as lesbian, bisexual, or queer woman
* Assigned female sex at birth
* English speaking
* ages 25-65 years
* report not having had a pap smear in the last three years (per USPSTF guidelines)
* if age 30 or over, report not having a pap smear/HPV co-test within the past 5 years (per USPSTF guidelines)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 25 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* report having had a hysterectomy
* report having history of cervical cancer
* unable to consent
* Pregnant women
* Prisoners
